properties.Description: Bandit's Shock Wire can electrify reinforced walls. Hibana's X-KAIROS pellets will be instantly destroyed if they are on an electrified wall. Bandit can very easily 'trick' Hibana's pellets.
Bandit's Shock Wire can electrify reinforced walls. Thermite's Exothermic Charge will be instantly destroyed if it is on an electrified wall. Bandit can easily 'trick' Thermite's charge.
Mute's Signal Disruptor can stop Hibana's X-KARIOS pellets from triggering.
Mute's Signal Disruptor can stop Thermite's Exothermic Charge from triggering.
Mute's Signal Disruptor can stop Fuze's Cluster Charges from triggering.
If placed correctly, Mute's Signal Disruptor can disrupt Twitch's Drone.
Mute's Signal Disruptor covers Jackal's Eyenox in static. This makes vision difficult and prevents Jackal from scanning Defender footprints.
When standing within range of Mute's Signal Disruptor, a defender can freely move without being detected by Lion's EE-ONE-D drone.

When standing within range of Mute's Signal Disruptor, a defender's phone will not ring when Dokkaebi activates her Logic Bomb. A ringing phone will stop if you step within range of a Signal Disruptor.
When standing within range of Mute's Signal Disruptor, Blitz's Flash Shield will be disrupted.
Rook's Armor Plates can mitigate some of Glaz's high ability to deal damage with his OTs-03.
When Caveira is using Silent Step, she leaves no footsteps and therefore cannot be scanned by Jackal's Eyenox.
Ash's Breaching rounds can destroy Castle's Armor Panels.
The Thermal Feedback System on Glaz's OTs-03 will not highlight Alibi's Prisma. This means Glaz is more likely to avoid shooting Alibi's Prisma.
Sledge's Breaching Hammer can knock down one of Castle's Armor Panels in a single hit.
Sledge's Breaching Hammer can destroy Maestro's Evil Eye in one hit even when it isn't open.
Smoke's 3 Gas Grenades are very effective against Montagne.
Smoke's 3 Gas Grenades are very effective against Blitz.
Smoke's 3 Gas Grenades are very effective against a Fuze with a shield.
Smoke's Gas Grenades deal 50% more damage to Attackers boosted by Finka's Adrenal Surge.
Smoke's 3 Gas Grenades are very effective against a Recruit with a shield.
Jäger's ADS can intercept Thatcher's EMP grenades.
Jäger's ADS can intercept Ying's Candela grenades or the Flash Charges.
Jäger's ADS can intercept Zofia's Impact Grenades and Concussion Grenades.
Jäger's ADS can destroy Nomad's Airjabs.
Jäger's ADS can intercept smoke grenades. Smoke grenades are a key part of Glaz's kit.
Jäger's ADS can intercept Ash's Breaching Rounds.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can destroy Mute's Signal Disruptors.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can destroy Smoke's Gas Grenades.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can destroy Kapkan's Entry Denial Devices.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can destroy Lesion's Gu mines.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can destroy Ela's Grzmot mines.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can disable Valkyrie's Black Eyes for a short period of time.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can destroy Jäger's ADS with careful placement. However, ADS also counters EMP Grenades.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can destroy Bandit's Shock Wire.
Bandit's Shock Wire can be used to electrify barbed wire which can kill a Twitch Drone that enters the wire. However, Shock Wire is still easily shot by a Twitch Drone.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can destroy Kaid's Electroclaws.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades disables Echo's Drone and forces it to the ground.

Kaid's Electroclaws can electrify reinforced walls. Thermite's Exothermic Charge will be instantly destroyed if it is on an electrified wall. It is technically possibly for Kaid to 'trick' Thermite's charge if you are extremely fast.
Kaid's Electroclaws can electrify reinforced walls. Hibana's X-KAIROS pellets will be instantly destroyed if they are on an electrified wall. Kaid can 'trick' Hibana's pellets.
Kaid's Electroclaws can be used to electrify barbed wire which can kill a Twitch Drone that enters the wire. However, an Electroclaw can be easily shot by a Twitch Drone is improperly positioned.
Maverick's Breaching Torch can make small holes in walls electrified by Bandit's Shock Wire.
Maverick's Breaching Torch can make small holes in walls electrified by Kaid's Electroclaws.
Maverick's Breaching Torch can make small holes in walls affected by Mute's Signal Disruptors. His Breaching Torch does not get disrupted.
Maverick's Breaching Torch can destroy Maestro's Evil Eye cameras while they are closed.
Dokkaebi can hack a defender's phone to gain access to the Maestro's Evil Eye cameras. She cannot fire his cameras, however.
Dokkaebi can hack a defender's phone to gain access to Valkyrie's Black Eyes.
Vigil's ERC-7 allows him to remove himself from cameras hacked by Dokkaebi.
Echo's Yokai drone camera cannot be hacked by Dokkaebi. Echo does not drop a phone upon death. In addition, Echo is unaffected by Dokkaebi's Logic Bomb.
If a defender's phone is dropped into barbed wire electrified by Bandit's Shock Wire, it is destroyed.
If a defender's phone is dropped into barbed wire electrified by Kaid's Electroclaws, it is destroyed.
Ela's Grzmot Mines will disorient Montagne, preventing him from extending his shield.
Ela's Grzmot Mines will disorient Blitz preventing him from sprinting with his shield up.
Ela's Grzmot Mines will disorient Jackal, causing him to kick off his goggles.
Blitz cannot sprint whenever stuck with a Lesion Gu needle.
Montagne can be put in a very vulnerable position when stuck with a Lesion Gu needle.
Finka's Adrenal Surge reduces the duration that Ela's Grzmot mines affect Attackers.
Zofia is affected for a reduced amount of time by Ela's Grzmot mines.
Zofia is affected for a reduced amount of time by Echo's Yokai drone.
Echo's Yokai drone will cause Jackal's goggles to be kicked off.
Pulse's Heartbeat Sensor will detect Attackers boosted by Finka's Adrenal Surge for twice the amount of time.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can can disable Pulse's Heartbeat Sensor for a period of time.
Capitão's Tactical Crossbow can fire asphyxiating bolts that can be used to safely and easily take down a defender using Tachanka's Mounted LMG.
Fuze's Cluster Charges can be used to take down a defender using Tachanka's Mounted LMG if its position is known.
Ash's Breaching Rounds can be used to destroy a deployable shield protecting Tachanka's Mounted LMG.
Nomad's Airjab can be used to knock Clash to the ground leaving her extremely vulnerable.
Zofia's Concussion Grenades can make Clash very vulnerable.
Ela can recover quickly if hit by one of Zofia's Concussion Grenades.
Twitch's Drone can easily pop out Mira's Black Mirrors.
Vigil's BOSG.12.2 shotgun can destroy Blackbeard's Rifle-Shield in a single shot.
Caveira's Lusion pistol can destroy Blackbeard's Rifle-Shield in a single shot at close range.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Pulse's Heartbeat Sensor and therefore him.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Mute's Signal Disruptors.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Kapkan's Entry Denial Devices.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Jäger's ADS.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Bandit's Shock Wire.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Smoke's Gas Grenades.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Valkyrie's Black Eye cameras.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Echo's Yokai and his wrist phone (therefore, also detecting him).
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Lesion's Gu mines.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Ela's Grzmot mines.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Vigil when he is using his ERC-7 ability.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Maestro's Evil Eyes.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Alibi's Prismas.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Clash's Electro Shield when it is firing.
Zofia is not able to use her self-revive when trapped in one of Frost's Welcome Mats.

Jäger's ADS can intercept Fuze's Cluster Charges. Fuze gets three charges each with five sub-grenades (15 total) and Jäger's ADS can block two projectiles each (6 total). This means ADS is only partially effective against a Fuze attack.

Fuze's Cluster charges can waste Jäger's ADS total interceptions. Fuze gets three charges each with five sub-grenades (15 total) and Jäger's ADS can block two projectiles each (6 total). This means that one Cluster Charge has the potential to disable two Active Defense Systems.
Hibana's X-KAIROS pellets can destroy Castle's Armor Panel if necessary.
Vigil's ERC-7 allows him to remove himself from Twitch's Drone camera.
Twitch's Drone can easily shoot Bandit's Shock Wire.
If careful, Twitch's Drone can shoot Mute's Signal Disruptor.
Twitch's Drone can shoot Kaid's Electroclaws.
Twitch's Drone can shoot Alibi's Prismas.
Twitch's Drone can shoot Echo's Drone but it is unable to see it when it is cloaked.
Twitch's Drone can shoot Ela's Grzmot mines.
Twitch's Drone can shoot Jäger's ADS.
Twitch's Drone can shoot Kapkan's Entry Denial Devices.
Twitch's Drone can shoot Lesion's Gu mines.
Twitch's Drone can temporarily disable Maestro's Evil Eye cameras by shooting at them when they are closed.
Thatcher's EMP grenades can disable Alibi's Prisma for a short period of time.
Doc's stim pistol can heal damage done by Capitão's asphyxiation bolts.
Doc's stim pistol can heal damage done by Twitch's Shock Drone.
Capitão's Tactical Crossbow can fire asphyxiating bolts that can be used to easily take out Clash.
Ying has the ability to place her Candela on a breachable surface releasing all 6 Flash Charges. This drains all three ADSs.
Thatcher's EMP Grenades can temporarily disable Clash's taser.
Zofia's Impact Grenades can destroy Castle's Armor Panels.
Zofia's Impact Grenades can destroy Maestro's Evil Eye cameras while they are closed.
Ash's Breaching Rounds can destroy Maestro's Evil Eye cameras while they are closed.
Finka can use her Adrenal Surge to revive a downed ally preventing an interrogation from Caveira. This ally cannot be downed again.
Although vulnerable while doing it, Maverick can use his Breaching Torch to drop the glass from Mira's Black Mirror from the opposite side of a reinforced wall.
Hibana's X-KAIROS pellets can destroy Mira's Black Mirror.
Blitz can use his Flash Shield to blind Defenders on the other side of Mira's Black Mirrors.
IQ's Electronics Detector can detect Mozzie's Pests or Attacker drones that have been hacked by a Pest.
Dokkaebi can hack a defender's phone to gain access to drones hacked by Mozzie's Pests. Attackers, however, will not regain movement control of the drones.
Gridlock's Trax Stingers can impede Vigil's strong roaming capabilities.
Gridlock's Trax Stingers can impede Caveira's strong roaming capabilities.
Capitão's Tactical Crossbow can fire asphyxiating bolts that can be used to safely and easily flush out defenders using Mira's Black Mirrors.
Mozzie's Pests can hack Twitch's Shock Drone. The hacked drone can still shoot darts.
Twitch's drone can shoot down Echo's drone.
